lead_paragraph: DRAPKIN--Donald. Our dear friend has left us too early. His love of life, brilliance, loyalty, and magnetic personality will never be forgotten. He was a visionary and rare gem, a giant amongst men, whom we loved and will forever remember. Our love and deepest condolences to the Drapkin and Baumgarten families. The Browns and Sweetwoods 1/3
